name: Mobile Web Media
overview:
Over 17 successful years in business we can tell you with certainty that the starting point of your mobile marketing strategy that you have a website optimized for mobile devices. Standard web sites are not designed for mobile devices, as they slow to load and difficult to browse. When visitors visit your site via a mobile phone, they need easy to access to your services with few clicks.

Number of consumers accessing the web from their smartphones instead of desktop computers are increasing everyday in Dubai. To have a version of your current website, that works with these devices, is becoming most important today for businesses.

Our proven technology work on all modern phones. We delivers cost effective, professional looking websites design in Dubai. From your standard website, we create a mobile version, made specifically for all types of smart phones. Our company is specialized in innovative and engaging mobile development, promotions and QR Code marketing campaigns in Dubai UAE.

Feel free to have a look around our web page, and see how we can help you to make your first steps in mobile marketing. We are first official mobile web design company in Dubai, UAE.

By the end of 2013, the number of people using mobile devices to search the Web exceed 2.3 billion. Mobile Internet is a continually growing platform, moving faster than anything else. On Feb 10th, 2011 in New York, Google reported a 400% increase in the number of searches being carried out on mobile devices, compared to the same time the previous year. For the first time ever, in 2009 more mobile devices than desktop computers were sold. When mobile users cannot easily read your web site, this increases bounce rate of your site, which can cause your site to lose top positions on Google.
